1-2 punch.Card Text: Play: Stun an enemy creature. If that creature was already stunned, destroy it instead.
1-2 punch.Flavor text: Giants can count past two, but why bother.

library of the damned.Flavor text: ”This place takes the idea of losing yourself in a book to a whole new level.” – Doc Bookton

first blood.Card Text: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Deal 2<d> for each friendly Brobnar creature. You may divide this damage among any numbers of creatures.</d>

bingle bangbang.Card Text: Before Fight: Deal 5 damage to each neighbor of the creature Bingel Bangbang fights.

groke.Flavor text: "Fierce as a Brutodon and about as sharp." - Livia the Elder

drummernaut.Card Text: Play/Fight/Reap: Return a friendly Giant creature to your hand.
drummernaut.Flavor text: "Ain't nothin', ain't nobody, that can beat my beat."

into the fray.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, a friendly Brobnar creature gains, "Fight: Ready this creature."

burn the stockpile.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has 7 aember or more, they lose 4 aember.
burn the stockpile.Flavor text: “If you can’t protect it, you don’t deserve it.” –Bilgum Avalanche

barehanded.Card Text: Play: Put each artifact on top of its owner’s deck.

blood money.Card Text: Play: Place 2 aember from the common supply on an enemy creature.

warsong.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 aember each time a friendly creature fights.

brothers in battle.Card Text: Play: Choose a house. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature of that house may fight.

effervescent principle.Card Text: Play: Each player loses half their  aember (rounding down the loss). Gain 1 chain.

cowfyne.Card Text: Before Fight: Deal 2 damage to each neighbor of the creature Cowfyne fights.

punch.Card Text: Play: Deal 3 damage to a creature.

lollop the titanic.Card Text: Lollop the Titanic deals no damage when attacked.
lollop the titanic.Flavor text: "Titans are to giants as giants are to goblins." - Dr. Shucks

groggins.Card Text: When Groggins is used to fight, it can only attack flank creatures.

champion's challenge.Card Text: Play: Destroy each enemy creature except the most powerful enemy creature. Destroy each friendly creature except the most powerful friendly creature. Ready and fight with your remaining creature.

lava ball.Card Text: Play: Deal 4 damage to a creature with 2 damage splash.

relentless assault.Card Text: Play: Ready and fight with up to 3 different friendly creatures, one at a time.

gauntlet of command.Card Text: Action: Ready and fight with a friendly creature.
gauntlet of command.Flavor text: “I said ‘take me to your leader’ and got a fist to the face.”  –Captain Val Jericho

loot the bodies.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 aember each time an enemy creature is destroyed.
loot the bodies.Flavor text: “Loot the Bodies! Hit the Floor! Loot the Bodies! Hit the Floor!” –Brobnar War Chant

follow the leader.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature may fight.

culf the quiet.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)

grump buggy.Card Text: Your opponent's keys cost +1 aember for each friendly creature with power 5 or higher. Your keys cost +1 aember for each enemy creature with power 5 or higher.

tremor.Card Text: Play: Stun a creature and each of its neighbors.

mighty javelin.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Mighty Javelin. Deal 4 damage to a creature.

grumpus tamer.Card Text: Reap: Search your deck and discard pile for a War Grumpus, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

rogue ogre.Card Text: At the end of your turn, if you played exactly one card this turn, Rogue Ogre heals 2 damage and captures 1 aember.
rogue ogre.Flavor text: “I like to think of it as a Roguere.” –Dodger

take that, smartypants.Card Text: Play: Steal 2 aember if your opponent has 3 or more Logos cards in play.
take that, smartypants.Flavor text: “Them bots don’t wear pants. I carry spares.”

anger.Card Text: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature.
anger.Flavor text: “Don’t make them angry you say? Heh. The Brobnar are born angry.” –Old Bruno

autocannon.Card Text: Deal 1 damage to each creature after it enters play.

king of the crag.Card Text: Each enemy Brobnar creature gets –2 power.
king of the crag.Flavor text: Overthrowing this king is an uphill battle.

looter goblin.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 aember each time an enemy creature is destroyed.

pile of skulls.Card Text: Each time an enemy creature is destroyed during your turn, a friendly creature captures 1 aember.

screechbomb.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Screechbomb. Your opponent loses 2 aember.
screechbomb.Flavor text: “I think that thing made me deaf!”“What? I can’t hear you! I think that thing made me deaf!”

troll.Flavor text: Don’t feed it, it’ll go away.

unguarded camp.Card Text: Play: For each creature you have in excess of your opponent, a friendly creature captures 1 aember. Each creature cannot capture more than 1 aember this way.

mugwump.Card Text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Mugwump, fully heal Mugwump and give it a +1 power counter.

coward's end.Card Text: Play: Destroy each undamaged creature. Gain 3 chains.

ganger chieftain.Card Text: Play: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.
ganger chieftain.Flavor text: It takes two to fight, but more is better.

blood of titans.Flavor text: “Blood of Giants? Why stop there?”  –Pingle Who Annoys

yurk.Card Text: Play: Choose and discard a card from your hand.
yurk.Flavor text: "They aren't that bad if you can pay their price." - Iona, Demonologist

smith.Card Text: Play: Gain 2 aember if you control more creatures than your opponent.

iron obelisk.Card Text: Your opponent’s keys cost +1 aember for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

\u00e6mber imp.Card Text: Elusive. After a creature reaps, stun it.
\u00e6mber imp.Flavor text: "Even the rocks themselves suffer here." - Eldest Bear

earthshaker.Card Text: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or lower.

arise!.Card Text: Play: Choose a house. Return each creature of that house from your discard pile to your hand. Gain 1 chain.

hebe the huge.Card Text: Play: Deal 2 damage to each other undamaged creature.

cannon.Card Text: Action: Deal 2 damage to a creature.

dance of doom.Card Text: Play: Choose a number. Destroy each creature with power equal to that number.

tendrils of pain.Card Text: Play: Deal 1 damage to each creature. Deal an additional 3 damage to each creature if your opponent forged a key on their previous turn.

firespitter.Card Text: Before Fight: Deal 1 damage to each enemy creature.
firespitter.Flavor text: Guess how he got that name.

phoenix heart.Card Text: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Return this creature to its owner’s hand and deal 3 damage to each creature in play.”

unlocked gateway.Card Text: Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.) Play: Destroy each creature.
unlocked gateway.Flavor text: "Well, just lock it again!" - Quixo the "Adventurer"

smaaash.Flavor text: “I’m not sure he knows any other words.”

the warchest.Card Text: Action: Gain 1 aember for each enemy creature that was destroyed in a fight this turn.
the warchest.Flavor text: It doesn’t matter what the treasure is, only how it was won.

a fair game.Card Text: Play: Discard the top card of your opponent’s deck and reveal their hand. You gain 1 aember for each card of the discarded card’s house revealed this way. Your opponent repeats the preceding effect on you.

dominator bauble.Flavor text: “I know I shouldn’t’a nicked it, but ‘twere so…shiny. –Noddy the Thief

red-hot armor.Card Text: Play: Each enemy creature with armor loses all of its armor until the end of the turn and is dealt 1 damage for each point of armor it lost this way.

sound the horns.Card Text: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you either discard a Brobnar creature or run out of cards. If you discarded a Brobnar creature this way, put it into your hand.

rock-hurling giant.Card Text: During your turn, each time you discard a Brobnar card from your hand, you may deal 4 damage to a creature.

banish.Card Text: Play: Put an enemy creature into your opponent's archives.

gateway to dis.Card Text: Play: Destroy each creature. Gain 3 chains.

lash of broken dreams.Card Text: Action: Keys cost +3 aember during your opponent’s next turn.
lash of broken dreams.Flavor text: “At first, I thought that nothing could harm an Archon.”  –Captain Val Jericho

krump.Card Text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Krump, its controller loses 1 aember.

kelifi dragon.Card Text: Kelifi Dragon cannot be played unless you have 7 aember or more.Fight/Reap: Gain 1 aember. Deal 5 damage to a creature.

gub.Card Text: While Gub is not on a flank, it gets +5 power and gains taunt.

pandemonium.Card Text: Play: Each undamaged creature captures 1 aember from its opponent.

mind barb.Card Text: Play: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

bumpsy.Flavor text: Whatever he doesn’t like, he breaks. He doesn’t like anything.

gongoozle.Card Text: Play: Deal 3 damage to a creature. If it is not destroyed, its owner discards a random card from their hand.
gongoozle.Flavor text: “Just trying to understand these...’things’ gives me a headache.”

three fates.Card Text: Play: Destroy the 3 most powerful creatures.

streke.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) While Streke is not on a flank, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card during thier "draw cards" step.

bilgum avalanche.Card Text: After you forge a key, deal 2 damage to each enemy creature.
bilgum avalanche.Flavor text: “Some call her ‘warleader.’ Some call her ‘demon.’ I just call her ‘Avalanche.’” –Dodger

headhunter.Flavor text: “I mean, I think it’s a head...”

wardrummer.Card Text: Play: Return each other friendly Brobnar creature to your hand.

tireless crocag.Card Text: Tireless Crocag cannot reap.You may use Tireless Crocag as if it belonged to the active house.If your opponent has no creatures in play, destroy Tireless Crocag.

hecatomb.Card Text: Play: Destroy each Dis creature. Each player gains 1 aember for each creature they controlled that was destroyed this way.

creeping oblivion.Card Text: Play: Purge up to 2 cards from a discard pile.
creeping oblivion.Flavor text: “As far as oblivions go, it’s in my bottom three.” –Dr. Escotera

binding irons.Flavor text: "I will not chain you. You have already chained yourself through your blind affection for these mortals." - Judge Slenderwile, Archon

annihilation ritual.Card Text: When a creature would enter a discard pile from play, it is purged instead.

hysteria.Card Text: Play: Return each creature to its owner’s hand.

control the weak.Card Text: Play: Choose a house on your opponent’s identity card. Your opponent must choose that house as their active house on their next turn.

experimental therapy.Card Text: This creature belongs to all houses.Play: Stun and exhaust this creature.
experimental therapy.Flavor text: “This is for our research, so be honest. How do you feel?”

soulkeeper.Card Text: This creature gains: "Destroyed: Destroy the most powerful creature."

hand of dis.Card Text: Play: Destroy a creature that is not on a flank.

vespilon theorist.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Choose a house. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is of that house, archive it and gain 1 aember. Otherwise, discard it.

skullion.Flavor text: "Staying with the Skullions" - Crucible slang for death

eater of the dead.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Purge a creature from a discard pile. If you do, put a +1 power counter on Eater of the Dead.

lomir flamefist.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has 7 aember or more, they lose 2 aember.
lomir flamefist.Flavor text: “I thought his name would turn out to be... metaphorical.” – Quixo the “Adventurer”

gabos longarms.Card Text: Before Fight: Choose a creature. Gabos Longarms deals damage to that creature rather than the one it is fighting.

overlord greking.Card Text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Overlord Greking, put that creature into play under your control.

yo mama mastery.Card Text: This creature gains taunt.Play: Fully heal this creature.

pingle who annoys.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Deal 1 damage to each enemy creature after it enters play.

dust imp.Flavor text: When the demon’s away, the imps will play.

tentacus.Card Text: Your opponent must pay you 1 aember in order to use an artifact.

pitlord.Card Text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)While Pitlord is in play you must choose Dis as your active house.

stealer of souls.Card Text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Stealer of Souls, purge that creature and gain 1 aember.

library access.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each time you play another card, draw a card.

timetraveller.Card Text: Play: Draw 2 cards. Action: Shuffle Timetraveller into your deck.

fear.Card Text: Play: Return an enemy creature to its owner’s hand.

valdr.Card Text: Valdr deals +2 damage while attacking an enemy creature on the flank.

skippy timehog.Card Text: Play: Your opponent cannot use any cards next turn. (Cards can still be played and discarded.)

bouncing deathquark.Card Text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature and a friendly creature. You may repeat this effect as many times as you like, as long as it is possible to repeat the entire effect.

war grumpus.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Ready and fight with a neighboring Giant.
war grumpus.Flavor text: Only the Brobnar would look at a Grumpus and say, "Yeah, I'll tame that."

master of 2.Card Text: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 2 power.

poltergeist.Card Text: Play: Use an artifact controlled by any player as if it were yours. Destroy that artifact.

the terror.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has no  aember, gain 2 aember.
the terror.Flavor text: “I once thought that these creatures could be redeemed. Now I know better.” –Champion Anaphiel

help from future self.Card Text: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for a Timetraveller, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

binate rupture.Card Text: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Each player gains  aember equal to the  aember in their pool.

restringuntus.Card Text: Play: Choose a house. Your opponent cannot choose that house as their active house until Restringuntus leaves play.

key hammer.Card Text: Play: If your opponent forged a key on their previous turn, unforge it. Your opponent gains 6 aember.

titan mechanic.Card Text: While Titan Mechanic is on a flank, each key costs –1 aember.
titan mechanic.Flavor text: If they come, they will build it.

master of 3.Card Text: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 3 power.

lifeward.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Lifeward. Your opponent cannot play creatures on their next turn.

snudge.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Return an artifact or flank creature to its owner’s hand.
snudge.Flavor text: It’s only sensible to fear the dark.

eyegor.Card Text: Play: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand and discard the others.

key to dis.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Key to Dis. Destroy each creature.

standardized testing.Card Text: Play: Destroy each creature with the lowest power and each creature with the highest power.
standardized testing.Flavor text: The Logos like to call it aggresive motivation.

phase shift.Card Text: Play: You may play one non-Logos card this turn.

interdimensional graft.Card Text: Play: If an opponent forges a key on their next turn, they must give you their remaining  aember.

sacrificial altar.Card Text: Action: Purge a friendly Human creature from play. If you do, play a creature from your discard pile.

remote access.Card Text: Play: Use an opponent's artifact as if it were yours.

shaffles.Card Text: At the end of your turn, your opponent loses 1 aember.
shaffles.Flavor text: “Do you want imps? This is how you get imps.”

strange gizmo.Card Text: After you forge a key, destroy each creature and artifact.

scrambler storm.Card Text: Play: Your opponent cannot play action cards on their next turn.

master of 1.Card Text: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 1 power.

ember imp.Card Text: Your opponent cannot play more than 2 cards each turn.

soul snatcher.Card Text: Each time a creature is destroyed, its owner gains 1 aember.
soul snatcher.Flavor text: No one goes in, no one comes out. And yet the fires burn.

drumble.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Play: If your opponent has 7 aember or more, capture all of it.

flame-wreathed.Card Text: This creature gets +2 power and gains hazardous 2. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.)

mobius scroll.Card Text: Action: Archive Mobius Scroll and up to 2 cards from your hand.
mobius scroll.Flavor text: Once upon a time there was a scroll that began: Once upon a time…

brain eater.Card Text: After a creature is destroyed fighting Brain Eater, draw a card.

dr. escotera.Card Text: Play: Gain 1 aember for each forged key your opponent has.
dr. escotera.Flavor text: “Interesting reaction, but what does it mean?”

novu archaeologist.Card Text: Action: Archive a card from your discard pile.
novu archaeologist.Flavor text: “One civilization’s trash is... nope, still trash.”

guardian demon.Card Text: Play/Fight/Reap: Heal up to 2 damage from a creature. Deal that amount of damage to another creature.

tolas.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Each time a creature is destroyed, its opponent gains 1 aember.

sloppy labwork.Card Text: Play: Archive a card. Discard a card.
sloppy labwork.Flavor text: Don’t fret the details. Progress happens when you least expect it.

truebaru.Card Text: You must lose 3 aember in order to play Truebaru.  Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)Destroyed: Gain 5 aember.

chaos portal.Card Text: Action: Choose a house. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is of that house, play it.

succubus.Card Text: During their “draw cards” step, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card.

harland mindlock.Card Text: Play: Take control of an enemy flank creature until Harland Mindlock leaves play.

batdrone.Card Text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)Fight: Steal 1 aember.
batdrone.Flavor text: The worst part is the singing.

dysania.Card Text: Play: Your opponent discards each of their archived cards. You gain 1 aember for each card discarded this way.

tocsin.Card Text: Reap: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

dimension door.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, any  aember you would gain from reaping is stolen from your opponent instead.

mother.Card Text: During your “draw cards” step, refill your hand to 1 additional card.
mother.Flavor text: “Of course she’s necessary, she’s the mother of all invention!”

shooler.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has 4 aember or more, steal 1 aember.
shooler.Flavor text: “Demons only take, never give.” - The Sanctified Scroll

ozmo, martianologist.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Fight/Reap: Heal 3 damage from a Mars creature or stun a Mars creature.

pit demon.Flavor text: “They come from another world, they are pure evil made flesh and steel, and they lurk in the darkest corners of the land. Yes, I’m comfortable calling them ‘demons.’” –Science Officer Wu

neutron shark.Card Text: Play/Fight/Reap: Destroy an enemy creature or artifact and a friendly creature or artifact. Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is not a Logos card, trigger this effect again.

mars first.Card Text: Play: Ready and use a friendly Mars creature.
mars first.Flavor text: "Mars second, third and fourth, too, if you ask me." - Ulyq Megamouth

positron bolt.Card Text: Play: Deal 3 damage to a flank creature. Deal 2 damage to its neighbor. Deal 1 damage to the second creature’s other neighbor.

honorable claim.Card Text: Play: Each friendly Knight creature captures 1 aember.
honorable claim.Flavor text: “As your spirit is holy, so æmber, which is the spirit of the earth, is holy.” - The Sanctified Scroll

crazy killing machine.Card Text: Action: Discard the top card of each player’s deck. For each of those cards, destroy a creature or artifact of that card’s house, if able. If 2 cards are not destroyed as a result of this, destroy Crazy Killing Machine.

one stood against many.Card Text: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature 3 times, each time against a different enemy creature. Resolve these fights one at a time.

labwork.Flavor text: Attention to detail is the key to all progress.

knowledge is power.Card Text: Play: Choose one: Archive a card, or, for each archived card you have, gain 1 aember.

random access archives.Card Text: Play: Archive the top card of your deck.

battle fleet.Card Text: Play: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. For each card revealed this way, draw 1 card.

deep probe.Card Text: Play: Choose a house. Reveal your opponent's hand. Discard each creature of that house revealed this way.

irradiated \u00e6mber.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has 6 aember or more, deal 3 damage to each enemy creature.
irradiated \u00e6mber.Flavor text: “They poisoned Mars. We must not let them do the same here.” –Eldest Bear

martian hounds.Card Text: Play: Choose a creature. For each damaged creature, give the chosen creature two +1 power counters.

neuro syphon.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has more  aember than you, steal 1 aember and draw a card.

mars needs \u00e6mber.Card Text: Play: Each damaged enemy non-Mars creature captures 1 aember from their own side.

zysysyx shockworm.Card Text: After an enemy creature reaps, stun it.
zysysyx shockworm.Flavor text: "He shocks more than just worms; that's just a name." - Inka the Spider

mass abduction.Card Text: Play: Put up to 3 damaged enemy creatures into your archives. If any of these creatures leave your archives, they are put into their owner’s hand instead.

ganymede archivist.Flavor text: “They offered to let my crew stay with them. I politely declined.” –Captain Val Jericho

mothership support.Card Text: Play: For each friendly ready Mars creature, deal 2 damage to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

psychic bug.Card Text: Play/Reap: Look at your opponent’s hand.
psychic bug.Flavor text: “I’d make more, but I discovered lesser minds aren’t worth reading.” – Biologician Moreau

hayyel the merchant.Card Text: Each time you play an artifact, gain 1 aember.
hayyel the merchant.Flavor text: “The Enlightened are above haggling. Me, on the other hand…”

foggify.Card Text: Play: Your opponent cannot use creatures to fight on their next turn.

sample collection.Card Text: Play: Put an enemy creature into your archives for each key your opponent has forged. If any of these creatures leave your archives, they are put into their owner’s hand instead.

shatter storm.Card Text: Play: Lose all your  aember. Then, your opponent loses triple the amount of  aember you lost this way.

twin bolt emission.Card Text: Play: Deal 2 damage to a creature and deal 2 damage to a different creature.

eureka!.Card Text: Alpa. Play: Gain 2 aember Archive 2 random cards from your hand.
eureka!.Flavor text: 15 years, 40 million UX credits, and a 3% improvement on the real duck.

reverse time.Card Text: Play: Swap your deck and your discard pile. Then, shuffle your deck.

commpod.Card Text: Action: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. For each card revealed this way, you may ready one Mars creature.

spectral tunneler.Card Text: Action: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, that creature is considered a flank creature and gains, “Reap: Draw a card.”

library of babble.Flavor text: When you make an archive of all knowledge in the galaxy, don’t be surprised when you understand almost none of it.

archimedes.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Each of Archimedes's neighbors gains, "Destroyed: Archive this creature."

chuff ape.Card Text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)Chuff Ape enters play stunned.Fight/Reap: You may sacrifice another friendly creature. If you do, fully heal Chuff Ape.

invasion portal.Card Text: Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Mars creature or run out of cards. If you discard a Mars creature this way, put it into your hand.

nyzyk resonator.Card Text: For each neighbor Nyzyk Resonator has, your opponent's keys cost +2 aember

crystal hive.Card Text: Action: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 aember each time a creature reaps.
crystal hive.Flavor text: Behold the glory of Nova Hellas!

blypyp.Card Text: Reap: The next Mars creature you play this turn enters play ready.

grabber jammer.Card Text: Your opponent’s keys cost +1 aember.Fight/Reap: Capture 1 aember.

doc bookton.Flavor text: “Don’t worry, Momo. We’ll have this quantum death ray installed in no time.”

spangler box.Card Text: Action: Purge a creature in play. If you do, your opponent gains control of Spangler Box. If Spangler Box leaves play, return to play all cards purged by Spangler Box.

incubation chamber.Card Text: Omni: Reveal a Mars creature from your hand. If you do, archive it.
incubation chamber.Flavor text: Most Martians on the Crucible came out of one of these tanks.

dextre.Card Text: Play: Capture 1 aember.Destroyed: Put Dextre on top of your deck.

the howling pit.Card Text: During their “draw cards” step, each player refills their hand to 1 additional card.

wild wormhole.Card Text: Play: Play the top card of your deck.
wild wormhole.Flavor text: “But if we ever do recover the dataprobe, think of what we will learn!”

mindwarper.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Action: Choose an enemy creature. It captures 1 aember from its own side.

abond the armorsmith.Card Text: Other friendly creatures get +1 armor Action: For the remainder of the turn, other friendly creatures get +1 armor.

ether spider.Card Text: Ether Spider deals no damage when fighting.Each  aember that would be added to your opponent’s pool is captured by Ether Spider instead.

ulyq megamouth.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Use a friendly non-Mars creature.

yxilx dominator.Card Text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)Yxilx Dominator enters play stunned.
yxilx dominator.Flavor text: Core power online. Stand by for domination.

zorg.Card Text: Zorg enters play stunned. Before Fight: Stun the creature Zorg fights and each of that creature’s neighbors.

blinding light.Card Text: Play: Choose a house. Stun each creature of that house.

jammer pack.Card Text: This creature gains, “Your opponent's keys cost +2 aember.“

replicator.Card Text: Reap: Trigger the reap effect of another creature in play as if you controlled that creature. (That creature does not exhaust.)

glorious few.Card Text: Play: For each creature your opponent controls in excess of you, gain 1 aember.

quixo the \u201cadventurer\u201d.Card Text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)Fight: Draw a card.
quixo the \u201cadventurer\u201d.Flavor text: “...I’ll leave this part out of the memoir.”

swap widget.Card Text: Action: Return a ready friendly Mars creature to your hand. If you do, put a Mars creature with a different name from your hand into play, then ready it.

ghostly hand.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has exactly 1 aember, steal it.
ghostly hand.Flavor text: “I felt a little bad stealing from the Microputians, but only a little.” – Noddy the Thief

red planet ray gun.Card Text: This creature gains, “Reap: Choose a creature. Deal 1 damage to that creature for each Mars creature in play.”

pocket universe.Card Text: You may spend  aember on Pocket Universe when forging keys.Action: Move 1 aember from your pool to Pocket Universe.

imperial traitor.Card Text: Play: Look at your opponent’s hand. You may choose and purge a Sanctum card in it.

zyzzix the many.Card Text: Fight/Reap: You may reveal a creature from your hand. If you do, archive it and Zyzzix the Many gets three +1 power counters.

phylyx the disintegrator.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Action: Your opponent loses 1 aember for each other friendly Mars creature.

doorstep to heaven.Card Text: Play: Each player with 6 aember or more is reduced to 5 aember.
doorstep to heaven.Flavor text: The cities of the Sanctum are safe, clean, and vibrant like few others on the Crucible. But few are judged worthy to enter.

brain stem antenna.Card Text: This creature gains, “After you play a Mars creature, ready this creature and for the remainder of the turn it belongs to house Mars.”

research smoko.Card Text: Destroyed: Archive the top card of your deck.

rocket boots.Card Text: This creature gains, “Fight/Reap: If this is the first time this creature was used this turn, ready it.”

cleansing wave.Card Text: Play: Heal 1 damage from each creature. Gain 1 aember for each creature healed this way.

biomatrix backup.Card Text: This creature gains, “Destroyed: Put this creature into its owner's archives.”

collector worm.Card Text: Fight: Archive the creature Collector Worm fights. If that creature leaves your archives, put it in it's owner's hand isntead.

gorm of omm.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Gorm of Omm. Destroy an artifact.
gorm of omm.Flavor text: “An object, no matter how sacred, is just a thing.”

veylan analyst.Card Text: Each time you use an artifact, gain 1 aember.
veylan analyst.Flavor text: Logos are divided into two camps: Theorists and Mechanists. Each believes themselves to be superior to the other.

transposition sandals.Card Text: This creature gains, “Action: Swap this creature with another friendly creature in the battleline. You may use that other creature this turn.”

the grey rider.Card Text: Deploy. Play/Fight/Reap: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

inspiration.Card Text: Play: Ready and use a friendly creature.
inspiration.Flavor text: “The Sanctum gives meaning to my life.” - Duma the Martyr

sigil of brotherhood.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Sigil of Brotherhood. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly Sanctum creatures.

take hostages.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each time a friendly creature fights, it captures 1 aember.

the harder they come.Card Text: Play: Purge a creature with power 5 or higher.

emp blast.Card Text: Play: Each Mars creature and each Robot creature is stunned. Each artifact is destroyed.

key abduction.Card Text: Play: Return each Mars creature to its owner's hand. Then, you may forge a key at +9 aember current cost, reduced by 1 aember for each card in your hand.

champion tabris.Flavor text: “All my skill in battle brings me not one step closer to Enlightenment.”

epic quest.Card Text: Play: Archive each friendly Knight creature in play.Omni: If you have played 7 or more Sanctum cards this turn, sacrifice Epic Quest and forge a key at no cost.

orbital bombardment.Card Text: Play: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. For each card revealed this way, deal 2 damage to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

commander remiel.Card Text: Reap: Use a friendly non-Sanctum creature.
commander remiel.Flavor text: “I was not always a knight. Perhaps, someday, you will stand where I stand and see what I see.”

horseman of death.Card Text: Play: Return each Horseman creature from your discard pile to your hand.

hypnotic command.Card Text: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, choose an enemy creature to capture 1 aember from their own side.

potion of invulnerability.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Potion of Invulnerability. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature cannot be dealt damage.

bulwark.Card Text: Each of Bulwark’s neighbors gets +2 armor.

champion anaphiel.Card Text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)
champion anaphiel.Flavor text: “Steel thyself, Knave. To harm them you must first defeat me.”

ammonia clouds.Card Text: Play: Deal 3 damage to each creature.
ammonia clouds.Flavor text: Partly cloudy with a chance of acid rain.

martians make bad allies.Card Text: Play: Reveal your hand. Purge each revealed non-Mars creature and gain 1 aember for each card purged this way.

xanthyx harvester.Card Text: Xanthyx Harvester cannot be used while it has a non-Mars neighbor. Reap: Gain 1 aember

lord golgotha.Card Text: Before Fight: Deal 3 damage to each neighbor of the creature Lord Golgotha fights.

numquid the fair.Card Text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature. Repeat this card’s effect if your opponent still controls more creatures than you.

horseman of famine.Card Text: Play/Fight/Reap: Destroy the least powerful creature.

phosphorus stars.Card Text: Play: Stun each non-Mars creature. Gain 2 chains.
phosphorus stars.Flavor text: “Martians love da smell of dis spice, but it reminds me of Old Bruno’s feet.” - Dodger

psychic network.Card Text: Play: Steal 1 aember for each friendly ready Mars creature.

horseman of war.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature can be used as if they were in the active house, but can only fight.
horseman of war.Flavor text: And one only comes to slay.

jehu the bureaucrat.Card Text: After you choose Sanctum as your active house, gain 2 aember.
jehu the bureaucrat.Flavor text: “The knights protect the Sanctum. They are entitled to certain... benefits.”

hallowed blaster.Card Text: Action: Heal 3 damage from a creature.
hallowed blaster.Flavor text: Swords into plowshares is thinking too small.

soft landing.Card Text: Play: The next creature or artifact you play this turn enters play ready.
soft landing.Flavor text: Any landing you walk away from…

\u00e6mber conduction unit.Card Text: After an enemy creature reaps, if it is the first time a creature has reaped this turn, stun it.

mating season.Card Text: Play: Shuffle each Mars creature into its owner’s deck. Each player gains 1 aember for each creature shuffled into their deck this way.

protectrix.Card Text: Reap: You may fully heal a creature. If you do, that creature cannot be dealt damage for the remainder of the turn.

gatekeeper.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has 7 or more  aember, capture all but 5 of it.

furtive investors.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has more  aember than you, gain 1 aember for each key your opponent has forged.

squawker.Card Text: Play: Ready a Mars creature or stun a non-Mars creature.

virtuous works.Flavor text: On the Crucible, there is no sanctimony. There is only Sanctumony.

sniffer.Card Text: Action: For the remainder of the turn, each creature loses elusive.
sniffer.Flavor text: Even the Martians’ pets have a bone to pick with the other lifeforms on the Crucible.

protect the weak.Card Text: This creature gets +1 armor and gains taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

combat pheromones.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Combat Pheromones. You may use up to 2 other Mars cards this turn.
combat pheromones.Flavor text: “Don’t worry, this will only sting a lot.”

finishing blow.Card Text: Play: Destroy a damaged creature. If you do, steal 1 aember.

total recall.Card Text: Play: For each friendly ready creature, gain 1 aember. Return each friendly creature to your hand.

lamindra.Card Text: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Lamindra's neighbors gain elusive.

sequis.Flavor text: “I follow the Æmber light of the Sanctum, the light of truth and hope. What is it you follow?”

mothergun.Card Text: Action: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand. Deal damage to a creature equal to the number of Mars cards revealed this way.

life for a life.Card Text: Play: Sacrifice a creature to deal 6 damage to a creature.
life for a life.Flavor text: "it's a fair trade, boss. I don't mind."

sergeant zakiel.Card Text: Play: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature.

lady maxena.Card Text: Play: Stun a creature. Action: Return Lady Maxena to its owner’s hand.

custom virus.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Custom Virus. Purge a creature from your hand. Destroy each creature that shares a trait with the purged creature.

screaming cave.Card Text: Action: Shuffle your hand and discard pile into your deck.
screaming cave.Flavor text: ”Was that you, or the cave?” - Captain<nonbreak>Val<nonbreak>Jericho

feeding pit.Card Text: Action: Discard a creature from your hand. If you do, gain 1 aember.

bait and switch.Card Text: Play: If your opponent has more  aember than you, steal 1 aember. Repeat this card's effect if your opponent still has more  aember than you.

francus.Card Text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Francus, Francus captures 1 aember.

shoulder armor.Card Text: While this creature is on a flank, it gets +2 armor and +2 power.
shoulder armor.Flavor text: “I can’t see anything. Do I look cool?”

sanctum guardian.Card Text: Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)Fight/Reap: Swap Sanctum Guardian with another friendly creature in your battleline.

sucker punch.Card Text: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Play: Deal 2 damage to an enemy creature. If that creature is destroyed by this effect, archive Sucker Punch.

ronnie wristclocks.Card Text: Play: Steal 1 aember. If your opponent has 7 aember or more, steal 2 aember instead.
ronnie wristclocks.Flavor text: "You look like an Archon with a discriminating tastes."

throwing stars.Card Text: Play: Deal 1 damage to up to 3 creatures. Gain 1 aember for each creature destroyed this way.

qyxxlyx plague master.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Deal 3 damage to each Human creature. This damage cannot be prevented by armor.

tunk.Card Text: After you play another Mars creature, fully heal Tunk.
tunk.Flavor text: “Who’s driving?” “I thought you were.”“Let’s…not tell the Elders.”

yxili marauder.Card Text: Yxili Marauder gets +1 power for each  aember on it.Play: Capture 1 aember for each friendly ready Mars creature.

grommid.Card Text: You cannot play creatures.  After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Grommid, your opponent loses 1 aember.

key of darkness.Card Text: Play: Forge a key at +6 aember current cost. If your opponent has no  aember, forge a key at +2 aember current cost instead.

\"lion\" bautrem.Card Text: Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.) "Lion" Bautrem's neighbors get +2 power.

customs office.Card Text: Your opponent must pay you 1 aember in order to play an artifact.

treasure map.Card Text: Play: If you have not played any other cards this turn, gain 3 aember. For the remainder of the turn, you cannot play cards.

vezyma thinkdrone.Card Text: Reap: You may archive a friendly creature or artifact from play.
vezyma thinkdrone.Flavor text: Nothing helps me think like wanton destruction.

inka the spider.Card Text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)Play/Reap: Stun a creature.

aubade the grim.Card Text: Play: Capture 3 aember Reap: Discard 1 aember from Aubade the Grim.

guilty hearts.Card Text: Play: Destroy each creature with any  aember on it.
guilty hearts.Flavor text: C’mon, take it. You know you want to.

\u201cjohn smyth\u201d.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Fight/Reap: Ready a non-Agent Mars creature.

one last job.Card Text: Play: Purge each friendly Shadows creature. Steal 1 aember for each creature purged this way.

begone!.Card Text: Play: Choose one: destroy each Dis creature, or gain 1 aember.

mushroom man.Card Text: Mushroom Man gets +3 power for each unforged key you have.
mushroom man.Flavor text: “He’s a real fun guy if you get to know him.” –Eldest Bear

snufflegator.Card Text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)

yxilo bolter.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Deal 2 damage to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, purge it.

mighty tiger.Card Text: Play: Deal 4 damage to an enemy creature.

roxador.Card Text: Skirmish. Roxador only deals 2 damage when fithing. Fight: Stun the attacked creature.

murmook.Flavor text: “Look out for the pincers and don’t make it crabby. “ –Dr. Escotera

grovekeeper.Card Text: At the end of your turn, give each neighboring creature a +1 power counter.

nerve blast.Card Text: Play: Steal 1 aember. If you do, deal 2 damage to a creature.
nerve blast.Flavor text: “Don’t look so shocked to see me!”

uxlyx the zookeeper.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Put an enemy creature into your archives. If that creature leaves your archives, it is put into its owner’s hand instead.

clear mind.Flavor text: Thy body is an illusion. Only thy spirit is eternal.

charge!.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each creature you play gains, “Play: Deal 2 damage to an enemy creature.”

lights out.Card Text: Play: Return 2 enemy creatures to their owner’s hand.

oath of poverty.Card Text: Play: Destroy each of your artifacts. Gain 2 aember for each artifact destroyed this way.

masterplan.Card Text: Play: Put a card from your hand facedown beneath Masterplan.Omni: Play the card beneath Masterplan. Sacrifice Masterplan.

poison wave.Card Text: Play: Deal 2 damage to each creature.

shield of justice.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature cannot be dealt damage.

sneklifter.Card Text: Play: Take control of an enemy artifact. While under your control, if it does not belong to one of your three houses, it is considered to be of house Shadows.

magda the rat.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Play: Steal 2 aember.Leaves Play: Your opponent steals 2 aember.

round table.Card Text: Each friendly Knight creature gets +1 power and gains taunt.
round table.Flavor text: “Come my friends, let us ready for battle.” –King Godfrey Greywind

grey monk.Card Text: Each friendly creature gets +1 armor. Reap: Heal 2 damage from a creature.

whispering reliquary.Card Text: Action: Return an artifact to its owner's hand.

smite.Card Text: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature. Deal 2  damage to the attacked creature's neighbors.

terms of redress.Card Text: Play: Choose a friendly creature to capture 2 aember.

umbra.Card Text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)Fight: Steal 1 aember.
umbra.Flavor text: “When the fightin’s done, the real work begins.”

urchin.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Play: Steal 1 aember.

duma the martyr.Card Text: Destroyed: Fully heal each other friendly creature and draw 2 cards.
duma the martyr.Flavor text: “Remember me.”  - Squire Duma, at the Battle for the Gate of Hope.

panpaca, anga.Card Text: Creatures to the right of Panpaca, Anga in the battleline get +2 power.
panpaca, anga.Flavor text: "Dark wolf, black as night, always pounces to the right." - from "Panpaca", children's game.

briar grubbling.Card Text: Hazardous 5. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 5 damage to the attacking enemy.)
briar grubbling.Flavor text: Nature says “do not touch” in so many creative ways.

raiding knight.Flavor text: “Sacred Æmber is not meant for hands such as thine.”

staunch knight.Card Text: Staunch Knight gets +2 power while it is on a flank.

mantle of the zealot.Card Text: This creature gains, “You may use this creature as if it belonged to the active house.”

dharna.Card Text: Play: Gain 1 aember for each damaged friendly creature. Reap: Heal 2 damage from a friendly creature.

special delivery.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Special Delivery. Deal 3 damage to a flank creature. If this damage destroys that creature, purge it.

the spirit's way.Card Text: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or higher.
the spirit's way.Flavor text: “The spirit is eternal. The flesh is weak. Let go the flesh, for your earthly strength is the greatest prison.” - The Last Book

horseman of pestilence.Card Text: Play/Fight/Reap: Deal 1 damage to each non-Horseman creature.

lost in the woods.Card Text: Play: Choose 2 friendly creatures and 2 enemy creatures. Shuffle each chosen creature into its owner’s deck.

vigor.Card Text: Play: Heal up to 3 damage from a creature. If you healed 3 damage, gain 1 aember.

noddy the thief.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Action: Steal 1 aember.

radiant truth.Card Text: Play: Stun each enemy creature not on a flank.
radiant truth.Flavor text: “Truly I say to you: pie is superior to cake.” - from the Ravings of the Prophet Gizelhart

regrowth.Card Text: Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.
regrowth.Flavor text: “Deep in the heart of every bear, one can find...another bear.” -Dr. Escotera

ritual of balance.Card Text: Action: If your opponent has 6 aember or more, steal 1 aember.
ritual of balance.Flavor text: Is balance a means to an end, or an end in itself?

grasping vines.Card Text: Play: Return up to 3 artifacts to their owners’ hands.

tantadlin.Card Text: Tantadlin only deals 2 damage when fighting. Fight: Discard a random card from your opponent's archives.

they're everywhere!.Card Text: Play: Deal 2 damage to each enemy flank creature. Deal 1 damage to each enemy creature not on a flank.

swindle.Card Text: Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.) Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.) Play: Steal 3 aember.

nightforge.Card Text: Play: If you have not forged a key this turn, you may forge a key at +4 aember current cost.

yantzee gang.Flavor text: "This hand's not gonna fill itself." "It might, though" "Stow it Clyde; I'm working a bit here!"

booby trap.Card Text: Play: Deal 4 damage to a creature that is not on a flank with 2 damage splash.

mighty lance.Card Text: Play: Deal 3 damage to a creature and 3 damage to a neighbor of that creature.

armageddon cloak.Card Text: This creature gains hazardous 2 and, “Destroyed: Fully heal this creature and destroy Armageddon Cloak instead.”

nocturnal maneuver.Flavor text: Every world has its fearsome creatures that thrive in the darkness, and the Crucible has them all.

old bruno.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Play: Capture 3 aember.

whistling darts.Card Text: Play: Deal 1 damage to each enemy creature.

cooperative hunting.Card Text: Play: Deal 1 damage for each friendly creature in play. You may divide this damage among any number of creatures.

miasma.Card Text: Play: Your opponent skips the “forge a key” step on their next turn.

word of returning.Card Text: Play: Deal 1 damage to each enemy creature for each  aember on it. Return all  aember from those creatures to your pool.

knoxx.Card Text: Knoxx gets +3 power for each neighbor it has.
knoxx.Flavor text: "The hypnopotamus is the deadliest animal on the three known plants." - Science Officer Wu

pawn sacrifice.Card Text: Play: Sacrifice a friendly creature. If you do, deal 3 damage each to 2 creatures.

oubliette.Card Text: Play: Purge a creature with power 3 or lower.
oubliette.Flavor text: “I forgot we had this down here!”

too much to protect.Card Text: Play: Steal all but 6 of your opponent’s  aember.
too much to protect.Flavor text: Not taking it would be the real crime.

evasion sigil.Card Text: Before a creature fights, discard the top card of its controller's deck. If the discarded card is of the active house, exhaust that creature with no effect.

world tree.Card Text: Action: Return a creature from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

flaxia.Card Text: Play: Gain 2 aember if you control more creatures than your opponent.

routine job.Card Text: Play: Steal 1 aember. Then, steal 1 aember for each copy of Routine Job in your discard pile.

nature's call.Card Text: Play: Return up to 3 creatures to their owners’ hands.

song of spring.Card Text: Play: Shuffle any number of friendly Untamed creatures from your hand, discard pile, or battleline back into your deck.

lupo the scarred.Card Text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Play: Deal 2 damage to an enemy creature.
lupo the scarred.Flavor text: “Nothing that big should be able to move that silently.”  –Lost Lukas Lawrence

niffle ape.Card Text: While Niffle Ape is attacking, ignore taunt and elusive.
niffle ape.Flavor text: “Did it just say Niffle?” –Captain Val Jericho

kindrith longshot.Card Text: Elusive. Skirmish.Reap: Deal 2 damage to a creature.

ring of invisibility.Card Text: This creature gains elusive and skirmish.
ring of invisibility.Flavor text: “I put it down for just a second...”

the sting.Card Text: Skip your “forge a key” step.You get all  aember spent by your opponent when forging keys.Action: Sacrifice The Sting.

relentless whispers.Card Text: Play: Deal 2 damage to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, steal 1 aember.

shadow self.Card Text: Shadow Self deals no damage when fighting.  Damage dealt to non-Specter neighbors is dealt to Shadow Self instead.

niffle queen.Card Text: Each other friendly Beast creature gets +1 power.Each other friendly Niffle creature gets +1 power.

full moon.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1 aember each time you play a creature.
full moon.Flavor text: ”Mathematically, a moon orbiting the Crucible is impossible.””Then what is that?!”

curiosity.Flavor text: “It started with Schrödinger’s cat and just kept going from there.” – Quixo the “Adventurer”

stampede.Card Text: Play: If you used 3 or more creatures this turn, steal 2 aember.
stampede.Flavor text: “Better to run with the herd than be trampled beneath it.” –Eldest Bear

nexus.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Use an opponent’s artifact as if it were yours.

mimicry.Card Text: When you play this card, treat it as a copy of an action card in your opponent’s discard pile.
mimicry.Flavor text: It is said that if you travel far enough across the Crucible, you will eventually meet yourself.

smiling ruth.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: If you forged a key this turn, take control of an enemy flank creature.

duskrunner.Flavor text: “Call me Night-Haunter and Duskrunner, call me Who-Goes-There? and Just-The-Wind.” –‘The First Thief’, a Shadows children’s tale

fogbank.Card Text: Play: Your opponent cannot use creatures to fight on their next turn.

macis asp.Card Text: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

shard of life.Card Text: Action: Shuffle a card from your discard pile into your deck for each friendly Shard.

carlo phantom.Card Text: Elusive. Skirmish.Each time you play an artifact, steal 1 aember.
carlo phantom.Flavor text: “Give me half a chance an’ I’ll steal the whole of it.”

lifeweb.Card Text: Play: If your opponent played 3 or more creatures on their previous turn, steal 2 aember.

dust pixie.Flavor text: The faeries are believed to be created by the Architects to tend to the plants and animals of the Crucible. In the eons since their creation, some have become…quirky.

teliga.Card Text: Each time your opponent plays a creature, gain 1 aember.
teliga.Flavor text: “Don’t try to change the Crucible to suit your needs. Let it change you.”

hunting witch.Card Text: Each time you play another creature, gain 1 aember.

witch of the wilds.Card Text: During each turn in which Untamed is not your active house, you may play one Untamed card.

speed sigil.Card Text: The first creature played each turn enters play ready.

ritual of the hunt.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Ritual of the Hunt. For the remainder of the turn, you may use friendly Untamed creatures.

witch of the eye.Card Text: Reap: Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

safe place.Card Text: You may spend  aember on Safe Place when forging keys.Action: Move 1 aember from your pool to Safe Place.

way of the wolf.Card Text: This creature gains skirmish.  (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)

silvertooth.Flavor text: If you see teeth gleaming in the dark, it’s already too late.

skeleton key.Card Text: Action: A friendly creature captures 1 aember.

longfused mines.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Longfused Mines. Deal 3 damage to each enemy creature not on a flank.

persistence hunting.Card Text: Play: Choose a house. Exhaust each enemy creature of the chosen house.

silent dagger.Card Text: This creature gains, “Reap: Deal 4 damage to a flank creature.”

save the pack.Card Text: Play: Destroy each damaged creature. Gain 1 chain.

bigtwig.Card Text: Bigtwig can only fight stunned creatures. Reap: Stun and exhaust a creature.

mack the knife.Card Text: Elusive.You may use Mack the Knife as if it belonged to the active house.Action: Deal 1 damage to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1 aember.

the common cold.Card Text: Play: Deal 1 damage to each creature. You may destroy all Mars creatures.
the common cold.Flavor text: “As it turns out, it’s a weaker version of the uncommon cold.” –Dr. Escotera

seeker needle.Card Text: Action: Deal 1 damage to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1 aember.

subtle maul.Card Text: Action: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

panpaca, jaga.Card Text: Skirmish. Creatures to the left of Panpaca, Jaga in the battleline gain skirmish.
panpaca, jaga.Flavor text: "Light wolf, stole a hen, to the left and start again." - from "Panpaca", children's game.

way of the porrcupine.Flavor text: "How do you put it on?" "Very carefully"

scout.Card Text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, up to 2 friendly creatures gain skirmish. Then, fight with those creatures one at a time.

nepenthe seed.Card Text: Omni: Sacrifice Nepenthe Seed. Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

bear flute.Card Text: Action: Fully heal an Ancient Bear. If there are no Ancient Bears in play, search your deck and discard pile and put each Ancient Bear from them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

troop call.Card Text: Play: Return each friendly Niffle creature from your discard pile and from play to your hand.

bulleteye.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Destroy a flank creature.

key charge.Card Text: Play: Lose 1 aember. If you do, you may forge a key at current cost.
key charge.Flavor text: “You might call it madness, but for all we know madness is a key ingredient.” –Inka the Spider

ancient bear.Card Text: Assault 2.(Before this creature attacks, deal 2 damage to the attacked enemy.)
ancient bear.Flavor text: ”And when I say ‘bear,’ I mean it in the loosest of terms.” – Quixo the “Adventurer”

duskwitch.Card Text: Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.) Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Your creatures enter play ready.

selwyn the fence.Card Text: Fight/Reap: Move 1 aember from one of your cards to your pool.

perilous wild.Flavor text: The Architects took great pains to make the Crucible inhabitable for creatures from worlds across the galaxy. But they didn’t make it safe.

dew faerie.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Gain 1 aember.

faygin.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Return an Urchin from play or from your discard pile to your hand.

halacor.Card Text: Each friendly flank creature gains skirmish. (When you use a creature with skirmish to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
halacor.Flavor text: “Forget the others, have you seen the teeth on that one?!”

deipno spymaster.Card Text: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Omni: Choose a friendly creature. You may use that creature this turn.

bad penny.Card Text: Destroyed: Return Bad Penny to your hand.
bad penny.Flavor text: A Bad Penny saved is a Bad Penny earned.

giant sloth.Card Text: You cannot use this card unless you have discarded an Untamed card from your hand this turn.Action: Gain 3 aember.

chota hazri.Card Text: Play: Lose 1 aember. If you do, you may forge a key at current cost.
chota hazri.Flavor text: “Plenty of machines in the wild. Some of ‘em’s even alive.”

piranha monkeys.Card Text: Play/Reap: Deal 2 damage to each other creature.
piranha monkeys.Flavor text: They can skeletonize a snufflegator in two minutes flat.

way of the bear.Card Text: This creature gains assault 2. (Before this creature attacks, deal 2 damage to the attacked enemy.)
